jobContext:
Develop Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) for quality assurance and ensure proper implementation of quality checks of flexible packaging products, containers, bottles.
Having good knowledge on metallization, UV printing, BE or Master in Plastic/Polymer Technology. 

Having Experience in Plastic related testing laboratory i.e. having good knowledge on Plastic testing equipment (Viscosity, MVR, Flexural, Impact etc.)

Work with the production team and assist them in achieving high levels of quality products as per standards
Conduct chemical tests and physical tests of raw materials and finished feeds on a regular basis 
Ensure the quality of the finished product constantly and compare with standard 
Handle and store laboratory equipment with safety and security 
Keep documentation of laboratory activities for reference purposes 
Check & test the quality of machines and chemicals
Anticipate problems/defects that may arise in the manufacturing process and take preparation accordingly 
Maintain quality control methodologies to carry out analysis
jobDescription: Develop Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) for quality assurance and ensure proper implementation of quality checks of flexible packaging products, containers, bottles.
educationalReq: Master of Science (MSc) in Chemistry, Applied Chemistry, Chemical Engineering, Pharmacy

jobContext: Lead the Technical Operations departments & Oversee all the activities, initiatives, systems, and tactics.

Manage maintenance and other utility supporting team.

Monitor the periodic machine maintenance.
Joint collaboration with QC and R&D dept. to maintain the product quality and new model development.

educationalReq: Minimum B.Sc in EEE/ IPE/ Renewable Energy from any reputed institute.

jobContext: লন্ড্রি সাবান, টয়লেট সাবান ও ডিটারজেন্ট তৈরির বাস্তব অভিজ্ঞতা থাকতে হবে।সাবান তৈরির অটোমেটিক মেশিন অপারেট করায় পারদর্শী হতে হবে।সাবান তৈরির কাঁচামাল সর্ম্পকে সম্যক ধারণা থাকতে হবে।সাবানের গুণগতমান রক্ষা করে প্যাকিং করার অভিজ্ঞতা থাকতে হবে।
jobDescription: লন্ড্রি সাবান, টয়লেট সাবান ও ডিটারজেন্ট তৈরির বাস্তব অভিজ্ঞতা থাকতে হবে।
educationalReq: বাস্তব অভিজ্ঞতা থাকলে শিক্ষাগত যোগ্যতার প্রয়োজন নেই।

jobDescription: Organize raw materials.
educationalReq: Honors/ Masters in Chemistry/ Pure Chemistry/ Applied Chemistry from any reputed institution.

jobContext:
To follow up on all production units. 
To follow up and improve productivity.
To follow up and monitor daily production reports. 
To check daily wastage report,
To check monthly raw material cost, individual section.
To check material inventory report.
To check delivery report monthly.
To check section-wise cost & profit monthly. 
To follow up on daily production target reports. 
To follow up on machine breakdown reports. 
To follow up on daily sample pending & delivery reports.
To follow up on R&D reports.
To follow up on production & machine efficiency reports.
jobDescription: To follow up on all production units.

jobContext:
Ensure the testing process pertaining to each module is done correctly and up to the standards and timely publish the results for process control purposes.
Explore & understanding of all the required parameters from all the stockholders and international certification body.
Conduct Training as per the requirements of quality and audit dept. on quality process and product safety standards. And how to improve the skills and knowledge.
Conduct Effective Pre-Production meetings with Production dept. & monitoring the production from the beginning to the shipment.
Conducting Quality inspections as inline, Pre-final & final inspection. & generate report accordingly.
Effectively interact with Technical, Development and Production team to maintain product quality; ensuring that targets are achieved.
Supervise sample evaluation and production approval by reviewing the Technical parameters and inline QC parameters. 
Design the rectification method by joint collaboration with R&D and Production department.
Monitored QA/QC performance by gathering relevant production data and producing statistical reports to be communicated with all related departments.
Identifying relevant quality-related training needs and conduct training.
Responsible for each aspect of quality control through production, incoming and outgoing material.
Ensuring all types of quality issue by Auditing & Controlling.
Follow up and maintain all quality related reports.
jobDescription: Ensure the testing process pertaining to each module is done correctly and up to the standards and timely publish the results for process control purposes.
educationalReq: Minimum B.Sc in EEE from reputed institution.

jobContext:
Assure on-time release of material and products for smooth production (Fresh Happy Nappy Pant Diaper, Fresh Happy Nappy Baby Wipes & Fresh Anonna Sanitary Napkin) and dispatch with good quality.
Execute analytical work (measurements, GSM, thickness, raw material strength, elongation, etc.) of raw materials, packaging materials, and finished goods as per the standard testing procedure to ensure that the results are accurate and useful.
Maintain Good Laboratory Practices (GLP) guidelines and good housekeeping in the laboratory followed by 5S (Sort, Set in Order, Shine, Standardize and Sustain) rules.
Monitor every stage of manufacturing activities and reduce wastage or defect followed by Current Good Manufacturing Practice (cGMP) guidelines.
Understand customer needs and requirements for continuous quality improvement as a part of Total Quality Management (TQM).
Prepare and update all documents i.e., specifications, test methods, and standard operating procedures (SOPs) for different tasks and train the workforce accordingly.
Prepare different types of reports such as non-conformance of product reports or processes, daily production quality reports by using tools like Root Cause Analysis (RCA) and submit it to supervisor.
jobDescription: Assure on-time release of material and products for smooth production (Fresh Happy Nappy Pant Diaper, Fresh Happy Nappy Baby Wipes & Fresh Anonna Sanitary Napkin) and dispatch with good quality.

jobDescription: Prepare production plan and execute complying with process parameter.

jobContext:
The Operations Manager`s role is to supervise and ensure the operational efficiency in courier service. This includes managing both the resources and processes to identify, recommend, develop, implement, and support cost-effective solutions for all aspects of operations.
Financial responsibility for revenue growth, cost control, debt collection and overall responsibility for budgetary deliverables in courier operations
Ensuring service levels in terms of delivery and collection are met through monitoring of service levels returns
Ensuring proper resource utilization and rationalization including human resource and fleet
jobDescription: The Operations Manager`s role is to supervise and ensure the operational efficiency in courier service. This includes managing both the resources and processes to identify, recommend, develop, implement, and support cost-effective solutions for all aspects of operations.

jobContext: We are a leading multinational company in the business of global healthcare. We manufacture products, like, Diabetes, Obesity, Haemophilia and Growth Hormone Disorders, and are now looking for a self-motivated and dynamic individual to lead our Bangladesh-based operations.Working at Novo Nordisk is never just a job. It`s the opportunity for a life-changing career. For over 90 years, Novo Nordisk has pioneered many therapeutic breakthroughs in Diabetes, Obesity, Haemophilia and Growth Hormone Disorders. As an employee at Novo Nordisk, you have the potential to make a difference to both people and society. By improving treatment, we will not only keep people healthy and productive, but also help their families and their communities.We offer our employees excellent global training and development opportunities and competitive compensation and benefits which will be commensurate with the employee`s contributions to the company. The following position (1 vacancy) is now available in Dhaka:Director of Operations:As the Director of Operations of Novo Nordisk Bangladesh, you will drive Operations, Business Planning, IT, Logistics and other local strategies for the Bangladesh affiliate as per business need and in line with directions from the Regional office. Your role will be instrumental in maintaining strong professional relationship with key external stakeholders, ensuring seamless supply of life saving medicine, delivering institutional sales targets and managing local manufacturing activities. You will also ensure that functions in the Affiliate understand and follow standards and processes which are constantly updated in response to changes in regulations, laws and industry (or other) trends that may impact the business and are often challenged and scrutinized by authorities.
jobDescription: We are a leading multinational company in the business of global healthcare. We manufacture products, like, Diabetes, Obesity, Haemophilia and Growth Hormone Disorders, and are now looking for a self-motivated and dynamic individual to lead our Bangladesh-based operations.
additionalReq: Mmnimum 8 years of experience in a large company with global outlook. Should have handled P&L responsibilities and is currently a team manager. Possess very good knowledge of Novo Nordisk processes and policies, extensive knowledge of pharmaceutical regulation and business transactions in the region, understanding and knowledge of systems (SAP R/3) and Data warehouse systems (BW), very good planning and analysis skills, structured task approach, good negotiation and interpersonal skills; have a quality mind-set, be customer oriented and constructive and challenging team member; demonstrate excellent communication skills, active listening; interpersonal skills; sound judgment and decision making, strong proven ability to act as a change agent within the organization and strong personal and professional ethical values, integrity and the energy level required to meet the demands of the position

jobContext: Supervise and manage the day-to-day operation of the organization. Develop and implement operational policies, procedures, and standards.Allocate and manage resources, including personnel, equipment, and budgets, to optimize efficiency and productivity.Monitor and control operational costs to meet budgetary goals.Supervise staff to ensure they have the necessary skills and knowledge to perform their roles effectively.Set clear performance expectations and provide regular feedback.Identify opportunities for process improvement and implement solutions to enhance efficiency, quality, and customer satisfaction.Continuously review and streamline workflows.Ensure that products or services meet quality standards and compliance requirements.Implement quality control measures and monitor performance metrics.Oversee inventory management, procurement, and supply chain logistics to maintain optimal stock levels and reduce lead times.Ensure that operations adhere to safety regulations and compliance standards.Develop and enforce safety protocols and procedures.Generate reports on key performance indicators (KPIs) and operational metrics.Analyze data to identify trends and areas for improvement.Collaborate with customer support teams to address customer concerns and maintain high levels of customer satisfaction.
jobDescription: Supervise and manage the day-to-day operation of the organization.
educationalReq: Masters in Chemistry / MBA from a reputed Universities.
